data.description: Design the 5-layer architecture: Layer 0 (Core), Layer 1 (Operational), Layer 2 (Contextual), Layer 3 (Persona), Layer 4 (Ephemeral). Define storage format, relationships, and inclusion rules.
data.title: Design: Layer architecture specification
